nodes.text: Lauréna Tylers was a female Human, the daughter of archeologist Jonas Tylers.

Lauréna was about seventeen at the time of the Galactic Civil War. Her father went missing after a mission on planet Shira, so she set up an intervention group to rescue him. With her companions, she got her father out of the clutches of stranded Nightsister known as "She".
Lauréna Tylers has only appeared in the French RPG magazine Casus Belli 109.
